member.name: T:Console.Console
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Console.Console.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Console.Console.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Console.Console.SilenceAbleConsole_BeSilentHelp
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Causes Console output to be disabled. Usage: BeSilent.

member.name: P:Console.Console.SilenceAbleConsole_DontBeSilentHelp
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Causes Console output to be enabled. Usage: DontBeSilent.

member.name: T:Console.IConsole
member.summary: Interface wrapping most basic Console functionality

member.name: M:Console.IConsole.WriteLine
member.summary: Write current line terminator to Console

member.name: M:Console.IConsole.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Write contents of string to Console, followed by current line terminator

member.name: M:Console.IConsole.WriteLine(System.Object)
member.summary: Write string representation of an object followed by current line terminator

member.name: M:Console.ISilenceAble.BeSilent
member.summary: Implement in class to disable output when called

member.name: M:Console.ISilenceAble.DontBeSilent
member.summary: Implement in class to enable output when called

members.member: in addition, it allows to silence the Console
